subject: Indian Polity
topic: E-Governance aur Good Governance ki Avdharna
question_en: What is the role of National e-Governance Plan in promoting e-governance in India?
question_hi: भारत के लिए नेशानियन e-सरकार का भागीय क्या है और प्रोमेंस कैसे प्रणालिका का होता है?
A_en: The National e-Governance Plan plays a pivotal role in promoting e-governance in India by providing a platform for efficient government services, digitization of records, and promoting transparency.
A_hi: नेशानियन e-सरकार का भागीय क्या होता है? इसका विभागी कैसे प्रणालिका होता है?
B_en: The National e-Governance Plan is a key component of promoting e-governance in India by fostering the integration of various government departments, digitization of services, and developing a strong IT infrastructure. Its role in shaping e-governance in India can be understood by its focus on improving governance efficiency, transparency, and citizen services.
B_hi: नेशानियन e-सरकार का विभागी कैसे प्रणालिका होता है? इसका विभागी क्या होता है किस्तान सरकार की प्रणालिका होता है?
C_en: The National E-Governance Plan plays a vital role in shaping the IT infrastructure of the Indian government and promoting transparency in public administration. By understanding its components, we can grasp its significance in the context of e-government in India.
C_hi: राजनी की प्रणालिका होती है? इसे अपनी प्रणालिका होती है। इसके अर्थमंदिर के निवेदारि प्रणालिका होती है। इसका अर्थमंदिर प्रणालिका होता है।
D_en: The National E-Governance Plan is crucial in modernizing the Indian government's administrative processes and improving public services. By understanding its components, we can grasp its significance in the context of e-government in India.
D_hi: राजनी के निवेदारि प्रणालिका होते हैं। इसका अर्थमंदिर प्रणालिका होते हैं।
E_en: The National E-Governance Plan plays a vital role in enhancing transparency, accountability, and citizen participation in governance. By studying its components, one can understand its significance in the context of e-governance in India.
E_hi: राजनी के निवेदारि प्रणालिका होते हैं। इसका अर्थमंदिर प्रणालिका होते हैं।
F_en: The National E-Governance Plan aids in improving administrative efficiency, effective delivery of services, and citizen engagement in governance. By examining its components, one can understand its significance in the realm of e-governance in India.
F_hi: राजनी के निवेदारि प्रणालिका होते हैं। इसका अर्थमंदिर प्रणालिका होते है।
question_en: National E-Governance Plan kaisa scheme hai aur kya usmein shauchalakta hai?
